name: Ibis Styles Paris Voltaire Republique

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: BRILLIANT HOTEL

likes.liked: — reception smelled of chocolate (candles they were burning!!) 24hr reception cover
likes.disliked: — didn't let us book in until 3.30, room wasn't ready, but left luggage and came back

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel was clean and modern, fairly spacious room considering other reviews of Paris hotels!! Apple on pillows on arrival, clean towels, room cleaned every day.
reviews.title: Questionable room policies but otherwise great budget hotel

likes.disliked: — giving key to management whenever we left the hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast was: juice,coffee,cereal, toast *selection of jams/honey), pastries,yoghurt, cheese, meat and fruit, so fairly substantial continental breakfast!!!!!
reviews.title: Ok for short trip, great budget hotel!

likes.liked: — The price was fine for the quality!
likes.disliked: — Rooms are not spacious, bathroom tiny and functional

reviews.title: could be worse... but could be BETTER
reviews.text: Beds actually really comfy, 2 pillows(hate when you only get one!!)

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Area nice, lots of shops,bars and restaurants, Metro close by easy access to all sights.
reviews.title: Great hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at this Hotel for 3 nights at the end of Jan 08. I was a bit scared as i didnt know Paris all that well and would never usually consider a 2 star Hotel, however i was wrong to worry! The hotel was great for what we needed, nice design , the rooms are small but big enough for what you need for a few days. Nice and clean and comfortable !
reviews.title: Great Value for Money
Perfect for us
reviews.text: The staff were great and spoke good english for those who may be worried about the language barrier.

There were towels changed every day, however even though it had a hairdrier of sorts in the rooms, its not powerful at all,or hot! more of a soft warm blow so for those who need to dry and straighten their hair in less than 4 hours take your own hairdrier!!
reviews.title: Good location for Paris break

likes.disliked: — Lack of space in the breakfast room

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Good budget hotel located in a reasonable area of Paris. Staff were very helpful on reception and booking in only took moments. No security issues at hotel we kept our door key card and the reception was always resourced.
reviews.title: Good value, reasonable location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Room was well decorated and clean but as previous reviews state on the small side, but in keeping with older properties in large cities. My opinion, okay for visits less than a week, after that the lack of storage may be an issue. The on suite good/clean again not that big.
reviews.title: Excellent value for money

reviews.text: Breakfast room sited in basement is bright clean and well run by the friendly efficient lady who greets you. Good choice coffee, cereal, cheese.ham, bread and toaster, fruit cocktail/juices, jams bread and pastries on table, probably best continental breakfast I've had.
reviews.title: Inconvenience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Location -local lived in part of Paris plenty of local shops, boulangerie's etc. bars, cafes, restaurants, good market on Tues/Friday mins from hotel on Rue Richard Lenoir.
reviews.title: Very good budget hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Getting there we travelled from CDG by RER to Gare Du Nord followed signs to Line 5 which has orange as colour for line and got off at the metro at Republique 5 mins walk from there. Print a map of area the Republique has several exits this will assist in going in right direction when leaving the metro.
reviews.title: Brilliantly placed hotel

likes.liked: — Location and style for a 2* hotel

aka: All Seasons Paris Voltaire Republique Hotel
